SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountPanel
The AccountPanel class represents a user account panel displaying account details such as the user's name, ID number, and status, along with a profile picture and header.
BookCalendar
The BookCalendar class extends CalendarView to provide functionality for highlighting a range of days based on check-in and check-out dates.
BookHotelPanel
The BookHotelPanel class represents a panel for booking a hotel room.
ButtonClickListener
The ButtonClickListener interface defines a callback method to handle button click events.
CalendarView
The CalendarView class represents a custom calendar panel with clickable day buttons.
ConfirmModPanel
The ConfirmModPanel class represents a confirmation panel for modification actions.
CreateHotelPanel
The CreateHotelPanel class represents a panel for creating a new hotel.
Customization
The Customization class provides utility methods for customizing UI components.
CustomTable
The CustomTable class extends JTable to provide a customized table with a specific color scheme and rounded corners.
DateAvailPanel
The DateAvailPanel class represents a panel displaying room availability and booking information for a specific hotel.
DeluxeRoom
Represents a deluxe room in the hotel, extending the Room class.
DiscountCode
Represents an abstract class for discount codes that can be applied to reservations.
EnhancedButtonClickListener
The EnhancedButtonClickListener interface extends ButtonClickListener to provide additional event handling capabilities for button clicks in the application.
ExecutiveRoom
Represents an executive room in the hotel, extending the Room class.
FilterPanel
The FilterPanel class represents a panel containing filtering options for displaying hotels.
HomePanel
The HomePanel class represents the main panel of the application, which displays a title, description, and a catalog of hotels.
Hotel
Represents a hotel with a name, base price, list of rooms, ist of reservations, and list of date price modifiers.
HotelItem
The HotelItem class represents a graphical component displaying a hotel in a user interface.
HotelOption
The HotelOption class represents a graphical component displaying detailed information about a hotel.
HotelsPanel
The HotelsPanel class represents a panel that displays a list of hotels with options to filter and add new hotels.
HRSController
The HRSController class is responsible for managing the interactions between the model and the view in the Hotel Reservation System (HRS).
HRSModel
The HRSModel class represents a model for managing a collection of hotels.
HRSView
 
IconButton
The IconButton class represents a button with an icon.
IWorkHere
Represents a discount code for employees, providing a 10% discount.
LayeredRoundPanel
The LayeredRoundPanel class is a custom JLayeredPane that supports rounded corners and a background color.
Main
The main class for launching the Hotel Reservation System application.
MainFrame
The MainFrame class represents the main window of the Hotel Reservation System (HRS) application.
ManagePanel
The ManagePanel class represents a management panel for hotel operations.
ManageSubPanel
The ManageSubPanel class represents a sub-panel used within the ManagePanel.
ModernScrollBarUI
The ModernScrollBarUI class customizes the appearance of a JScrollBar.
OptionButton
The OptionButton class extends the PanelButton class to create a custom button with a specified name and a custom font.
PanelButton
The PanelButton class extends JButton to create a custom-styled button with specified colors for different states (normal, hover, and click) and a custom font.
Payday
Represents a Payday discount code, providing a 7% discount for reservations spanning certain dates.
PriceBreakdownPanel
The PriceBreakdownPanel class represents a panel that displays the price breakdown for a specific reservation in a hotel.
Reservation
Represents a reservation with guest details, check-in and check-out dates, a room, a discount code (if applicable), and a list of date price modifiers.
ReservationsPanel
The ReservationsPanel class represents a panel that displays a table of reservations for a list of hotels.
ReservationView
The ReservationView class represents a panel that displays a list of reservations for a specific hotel.
ResInfoPanel
The ResInfoPanel class represents a panel that displays reservation information for a specific hotel, including guest information, room type, check-in/check-out dates, price breakdown, and total price.
Room
Represents a hotel room with a name, type, and base price.
RoomInfoPanel
The RoomInfoPanel class represents a panel that displays information about the rooms in a hotel.
RoomView
The RoomView class represents a panel that displays a list of rooms for a specific hotel.
RoundLabel
The RoundLabel class extends JLabel to create a label with rounded corners and a custom background color.
RoundPanel
The RoundPanel class extends JPanel to create a panel with rounded corners and a custom background color.
ScrollBarCustom
The ScrollBarCustom class extends JScrollBar to create a scrollbar with custom thumb and track colors.
ScrollPaneCustom
The ScrollPaneCustom class extends JScrollPane to create a custom scroll pane with specified colors for the thumb, track, and background, and a rounded background.
SelectedHotelPanel
The SelectedHotelPanel class represents a panel that displays detailed information about a selected hotel.
SidePanel
The SidePanel class represents a side navigation panel with buttons for different sections of the application, including Home, Hotels, Reservations, Account Settings, and Back.
Stay4Get1
Represents a Stay4Get1 discount code, providing a free night for reservations of five or more nights.
TextFieldCustom
The TextFieldCustom class represents a custom text field component with a rounded background, a label for the field name, and a text input area.
